UK a flat cake made of oatmeal, traditional in Scotland and some parts of northern England : This recipe makes about 28 bannocks. They sell a dozen varieties of Scots bread, including traditional oatmeal bannock.
Canadian English bread cooked on sticks over a fire, or in a pan: Whether you're using a conventional oven, a barbecue or even an open fire try out this recipe for bannock.
